name: angelsrefining
title: [AM] Angel's Refining
author: Arch666Angel
description: With AngelsInfiniteOres it adds ore refining to the game. Compound ores have to be refined before you are able to smelt and cast them into plates.
description_original: With AngelsInfiniteOres it adds ore refining to the game. Compound ores have to be refined before you are able to smelt and cast them into plates.
